long_description: If you're a progressing rider looking for comfort as you take on the entire mountain, choose the soft-flexing Burton Chloe snowboard boots. Speed dial lacing lets you quickly dial in the fit. Phantom linerless construction makes the boots extremely lightweight and comfortable, and easier to get on and off. Streamlined Speed Dial lacing system lets you twist your laces tight; laces are constantly fully engaged when tightening or loosening. Molded EVA footbeds for extended comfort; snow-proof internal gussets keep feet dry and comfortable. Soft-flexing, 3D molded tongues wrap the forefeet in comfort and offer a seamless flex. DynoLite outsoles are lightweight yet offer consistent support and cushioning; soles provide great traction on varied terrain.
short_description: If you're a progressing rider looking for comfort as you take on the entire mountain, choose the soft-flexing Burton Chloe snowboard boots. Speed dial lacing lets you quickly dial in the fit.
